SEARCH

Package utility

package utility
  • Class
    Description
    ColoredPrintStream
    The class is an extension of PrintStream that allows printing colored text to the terminal.
    CSVclear
    Utility class for clearing data from CSV files while retaining the header row CSV manipulation
    CSVread
    The class provides utility methods for reading various types of CSV files and mapping the data into different object types, such as User, Patient, Doctor, Pharmacist, Administrator, InventoryItem, ReplenishRequest, MedicalRecord, Schedule, and Appointment.
    CSVwrite
    A utility class that provides methods for writing objects and lists of objects to a CSV file.
    IDExtractor<T>
    Functional interface for extracting an ID from an object
    IDGenerator
    Functional interface for generating an ID for an object
    TerminalColors
    The TerminalColors class provides ANSI color codes for different user roles.
